name: Blobs for your Cult
description:
Blobs for your Cult is an arcade style game based on the theme colourful for the AMAZE train jam 2019. The focus is on diversity as you must collect an equal number of Blobs of each colour or face the consequences of prioritising one colour! All Blobs are equal, even the dumb one.

The idea is a cross between the claw machine arcade game and slime rancher. Beware, each Blob has their own quirks that make them hard/easy to catch!

Controls:
WASD/Arrows keys to move the cage
Space to drop the cage
Cannot use mouse in the game

Team members:
Dhannya Mathew: https://redthedemoncat.itch.io/ 
Duncan Smale: https://paratex1337.itch.io/

Happy Blobbing :)
